string-array.name: shopping_item_desc
string-array.item: An A to Z guide to 500 great painters and sculptors from medieval to modern times.
Named one of the best art books of 2008 by The New York Times and The Sunday Times
The Dutch painter Johannes Vermeer represents one of the great enigmas of 17th-century art.
A new selection of post-impressionist painter Vincent Van Goughs letters.
A frightening and powerful tale of the loss of freedom and identity.
For the first time the Jokers origin is revealed in this tale of insanity and human perseverance.
This masterpiece of modern comics storytelling brings to vivid life a dark world and an even darker man.
A new edition of one of the most important and critically acclaimed Batman adventures ever.
Harry Potter thinks he is an ordinary boy until he is taken to Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry.
In a hole in the ground there lived a hobbit.
Long ago, in a time forgotten, a preternatural event threw the seasons out of balance.
In a sleepy village in the Shire, young Frodo Baggins finds himself faced with an immense task.
Set on the desert planet Arrakis, Dune is the story of the boy Paul Atreides, heir to a noble family.
Six days ago, astronaut Mark Watney became one of the first people to walk on Mars.
IN THE YEAR 2044, reality is an ugly place.
It was January 2021, and Rick Deckard had a license to kill.
